text: Good Night, Little Ones! () is a long-running Russian-language children's television program. It has been on broadcast since 1964 (premiered during the Soviet era), it airs on the Carousel channel. In 1988, Fred Rogers had made a guest appearance on the show with Daniel Striped Tiger, as shown on Mister Rogers' Neighborhood, during the weekly theme, "Nighttime". ==References== Category:1964 television series debuts
title: Good Night, Little Ones!
